titleStmt.title: The description of a new world, called the blazing-world written by the thrice noble, illustrious, and excellent princesse, the Duchess of Newcastle.
titleStmt.author: Newcastle, Margaret Cavendish, Duchess of, 1624?-1674.
Newcastle, William Cavendish, Duke of, 1592-1676.

notesStmt.note: First separate ed., published 1666, with: Observations upon experimental philosophy.
Commendatory poem by William, Duke of Newcastle: 2nd prelim. leaf.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
